_header: Sickness of her sin sorrowfully was I-showed
_description: Six rhyming lines on Deliverance in an English prose homily

WorcF10.Transcription:
Siknes of hir synne sorfulliche was i schewidCristes owne kyndenes
                    clerliche was declaridBut goodenes of  e godhede graciusliche was
                    graunted
